text: Lower Chandler Pond is a pond in Duxbury and Pembroke, Massachusetts. The pond is located north of Reeds Millpond and south of Upper Chandler Pond. Pine Brook, a tributary of the Jones River, flows through the pond. The water quality has been impaired by non-native aquatic plants and non-native fish in the pond. ==External links== *Environmental Protection Agency *South Shore Coastal Watersheds - Lake Assessments Category:Ponds of Plymouth County, Massachusetts Category:Pembroke, Massachusetts Category:Duxbury, Massachusetts Category:Ponds of Massachusetts
title: Lower Chandler Pond
